name: Litter Landscapes
description:
Ripley Runt ready to go!

The runt of the litter takes on the brunt of the litter! Clean up the landscape while avoiding dangers including ghost nets and swarms of flies. Loop around to find more, it never ends! 

Controls:

Movement: Arrow Keys, Shift Key to run

Jump/Select: Space Bar

Additional Credits:
  • Game reskin/reimplementation of Crystal Castles. Atari, 1983 for a school group project
    • Gameplay: Ethan Keyser
    • Art/Debug: Angela Ku
    • Sound: Saima Mukadam
  • Title Screen: Brain.mp3 by Eggy Toast - licensed under CC BY-NC-SA 4.0
  • Main Game: Saxophone guy.mp3 by Eggy Toast - licensed under CC BY-NC-SA 4.0
  • Fonts and Sprites created in Aseprite
  • Made in Construct 3 (Free Edition)
